name: TrustNet Enforcement
description: TrustNet trust-to-act enforcement for OpenClaw tool execution with mandatory RootRegistry anchoring checks.

targetPrincipalId.description: Optional fixed target principal. If omitted, ctx.agentId is used.

toolMapPath.description: Path to deterministic tool->context mapping JSON.

rpcUrl.description: RPC endpoint used for RootRegistry anchoring checks.

policyManifestHash.description: Optional policy manifest hash attached to receipts.

receiptSignerKeyHex.description: Optional signer key passed to trustnet receipt.

trustnetBinary.description: Path to trustnet CLI binary. Defaults to trustnet on PATH.

receiptOutDir.description: Optional directory for persisted ActionReceipt JSON files.

askMode.description: How ASK is handled in before_tool_call.

unmappedDecision.description: Fallback for tools without mapping entries.

failOpen.description: If true, enforcement errors allow execution (not recommended).

apiBaseUrl.label: TrustNet API URL
apiBaseUrl.help: Base URL for decision and root endpoints.

decider.label: Decider
decider.help: Principal used in TrustNet decision queries.

toolMapPath.label: Tool Map Path
toolMapPath.help: Deterministic mapping JSON for OpenClaw tool names.

rpcUrl.label: RPC URL
rpcUrl.help: Chain RPC used to verify RootRegistry anchoring.

publisherAddress.label: Publisher Address
publisherAddress.help: Expected publisher EOA for root signatures.

receiptOutDir.label: Receipt Output Directory
receiptOutDir.help: If set, emitted ActionReceipts are persisted here.

failOpen.label: Fail Open
failOpen.help: Allow tool execution on TrustNet errors. Keep false for release.
